item.title: CVE-2024-35630|2024-06-03T10:27:07.336Z -- LJ Apps -- WP TripAdvisor Review Slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in LJ Apps WP TripAdvisor Review Slider allows Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects WP TripAdvisor Review Slider: from n/a through 12.6.
